actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

official_title: To authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to make direct loans to small business concerns that suffered substantial economic injury as a result of the terrorist attacks against the United States that occurred on September 11, 2001.
short_title: Economic Recovery for Small Businesses Act

summary.text: Economic Recovery for Small Businesses Act - Authorizes the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to make direct loans to any small business concern that suffered substantial economic injury as a result of the terrorist attacks of September 11, 2001.

titles.title: Economic Recovery for Small Businesses Act

To authorize the Administrator of the Small Business Administration to make direct loans to small business concerns that suffered substantial economic injury as a result of the terrorist attacks against the United States that occurred on September 11, 2001.
